clues.answer: why you shouldn't look at the sun
clues.clue: Because the cornea in your eye acts as a magnifying glass & your retina gets burned, even in an eclipse

clues.answer: Why was the Empire State Building built to the height it was built?
clues.clue: Because John J. Raskob of GM wanted to outdo Walter Chrysler in skyscraper building

clues.answer: why Richard Hatch was the Survivor
clues.clue: Because he outwitted, outplayed and outlasted 15 others on Pulau Tiga

clues.answer: Why was Odysseus lashed--why did he have himself lashed to the mast?
clues.clue: Because he wanted to hear the sirens, but not steer the ship to them
